ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] mid level armour questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... who ... Thanks for the info! I had this happen to me the other day when I, er, dreamed, yeah that s it, I was a Teir Dal Enchanter in Crushbone. I sat down
ygData.messageBody:
>You need to go upstairs in Freeport bard guild to find the one guy who
>bothered to learn his Instill Doubt skill well enough to train others. ;p
>
>Then the next time you are in wolf-form, you can annoy your party with ID.
>As a doggy, it triggers the attack animation. Doubly annoying to anyone
who
>has game sounds turned on.


Thanks for the info!
I had this happen to me the other day when I, er, dreamed, yeah
that's it, I was a Teir'Dal Enchanter in Crushbone. I sat down on the throne
("I suppose you are all wondering why I asked you here today") and bid them
entertain me with displays of martial skill. I commanded the Locals to
attack them to test their mettle, and I was also curious to see the color of
Feir'Dal blood. Some doggie there (I suppose to get a dirk or tunic for a
guildmate) started nipping at my heals, I am not sure if that is a bard only
thing but it was pretty funny. At any rate, It was a really great, er,
dream. *smile*

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
